Title: I'm in the market for a new phone and their specs are so high. If they made one with hdmi and usb ou...
Author: Jake Koenig
Summary: I'm in the market for a new phone and their specs are so high. If they made one with hdmi and usb out (with a usbc splitter can I already have that?) I wouldn't even need a laptop. I guess installing windows/ubuntu might be difficult.
